descriptionHtml:
Thank you if you report any bugs.
6.25.2012: v0.13 do some change to all talent.
---------------------------------
6.18.2012: v0.12 Fix Part of Orcs and Nords Bonos invalid bugs
---------------------------------
Argonian Talent:
Increase 50% healrate per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.
Can breath underwater.

Argonian Resist:
+<75>% PoisonResist.+<75>% DiseaseResist.

Argonian Weakness: 
-<25>% FrostResist
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Bretons Talent:
Increase 20% Conjuration during time per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.

Bretons Resist:
+<25>% MagicResist.

Weakness:
-<100>% DiseaseResist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Dark Elf Talent:
Increase 10% Destruction Magic Power per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.

Dark Elf Resist:
+<50>% FireResist.

Weakness:
-<25>% ShockResist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
High Elf Talent:
Increase 30 Magicka per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.

High Elf Weakness:
-<25>% MagicResist.-<10>% PhysicalDamage.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Imperials Talent:
Find a few more gold coin from anywhere.
+10% trade benefits.
+10% block effects.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Khajiit Talent:
Increase 5 claw damage per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.
Increase10% movement speed.

Khajiit Resist:
+<25>% FrostResist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Nords Talent:
Increase 5% physical damage and 20 natural defence per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.

Nords Resist:
+<50>% FrostResist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Orcs Talent:
Increase 10% Meleedamage and 3 Unarmed Damage  per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.
Increase 15% Two-hand weapon attack speed.
Increase 100% staminarate and healrate.

Orcs Weakness:
-50% All Magic Power.
-1.5 Magicka regeneration rate.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Redguards Talent:
Increase 5% One-hand weapon attack speed per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.

Redguards Resist:
+<10>% FireResist.+<50>%PoisonResist.

Redguards Weakness:
-<10>% FrostResist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Wood Elf Talent:
Increase 10% Draw Bow Speed per 5 character levels,max calculate level is 30.
Increase 15% Bow Damage.

Wood Elf Resist:
+<50>% PoisonResist +<50>% DiseaseResist.

Wood Elf Weakness:
-<25>% FireResist
----------------------------------

Installation:
-----------------------------------------
1. Extract the RaceTalentSetting.esp to your Data folder (...\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)
2. Run the Launcher and activate the esp and start the game
3. Done
author: AdventurerX
